title: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Body Worn Cameras

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Details of Requested Incidents:
Incident Date: 2024-05-25
Time: 20:38:00
Location: 1200 BLOCK W FAIRMONT AVE
Case ID (if available): 112
Details: Fatal incident, classified as outside.

Requested Materials:
	•	Full body camera footage from all officers present at the scene for each of the listed incidents.
	•	Any associated audio recordings or dashboard camera footage related to these incidents.
	•	Include unedited versions, unless legally mandated redactions are required.

I respectfully request that any associated fees for fulfilling this request be waived. This request is made in the interest of public accountability and transparency regarding law enforcement activities, which is a matter of significant public concern. I am not seeking these materials for commercial use, but rather to inform the public and support community advocacy efforts. Under FOIA and RTKL provisions, requests made for public benefit and non-commercial purposes are provided fee waivers. I kindly ask that you consider this waiver request as part of your response.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Body Cam Review
